lead_paragraph: Israel had been withholding the bodies of suspected attackers as a tactic meant to crack down on violence.
snippet: Israel had been withholding the bodies of suspected attackers as a tactic meant to crack down on violence.

headline.main: Israel: Military Returns Bodies of Palestinians Linked to Attacks
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Israel: Military Returns Bodies of Palestinians Linked to Attacks

abstract: Israeli army transfers bodies of 23 Palestinians, all reportedly involved in violence in Israel over last few months, to their families in West Bank.
